overview: Set in the very current world of gay clubs, Night In Eden finds plenty of time to dazzle with flashing fights, piercing sounds, a wild and aggressive cast, and some of the hottest and most talented porn studs around. Taped on location in one of Southern California's hottest, sleekest supper clubs, with a large cast of bartenders, deejays, security staff, and fun-loving party people, and produced with the technical expertise for which Studio 2000 has become noted, Night In Eden has the feeling and texture of a major studio release.
title: Nights in Eden
